alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne, Faulkner and northwestern White Counties through 300 PM CST... At 215 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Conway to Mayflower to near Little Italy. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway... Greenbrier... Vilonia... Mayflower... Wooster... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Enola... Mount Vernon... Pickles Gap... Gravel Hill... Springhill... Woolly Hollow State Park... Holland... Barney... Hamlet... Saltillo... Sidon... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Floyd... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and north central Arkansas.
